desc: A very large and heavy rock. Very cool.
set_desc: You see a patch of damp earth where the rock once lay
name: Cool Rock

desc: You try to grab him but all you hear is HEHEHEH
name: Bunny

desc: Whoa! Why are you trying to pick him up? He's just minding his own business
name: Snail

desc: You spend some time chasing around frogs
name: Frogs

desc: You pick up the stone and you feel the warm power within your palm
set_desc: Where once a powerful magic stone lay is now cold damp ground
name: Fire Stone

desc: You could but then you would have to carry around a pot the entire adventure
name: Pot

desc: You hope this next rock is cool, but alas
name: Rocks

desc: You feel wrong for picking this up
name: Shield

desc: You chase around the dragonfly around for a while
name: Dragonfly

desc: A woodman's axe, it feels comfortable in your hands
set_desc: The table feels quite empty without the axe... Oh well
name: Axe

desc: A machete, a bladed weapon much better at hacking away at vegetation but will make do in a fight
set_desc: You see J+N carved into the tree. A notch just above the only sign that the machete was ever there
name: Machete

desc: You figure it's best to wait to pick this when you want to give it to someone
name: Rose

desc: You try putting you hands on it and immediately find the pot to be boiling hot
name: Pot

desc: What are you going to pick up? The spider? Ew no way
name: Spider

desc: Oh Look the key to key clue! No wait no it's just your imagination
name: Key

desc: What do you want? This guys' vegetables?
name: Veggies

desc: You pick it up with one hand and it poops on you, best to put it back
name: Pot

desc: Still no cool rocks
name: Pot

desc: What? The camping bag?
name: Pot

desc: You pick through a few more rocks, still none
name: Pot

desc: Thanks to your actions of trying to pick something up you once again find the floor, it's below your feet
name: Pot

desc: You can't fit a whole bridge into your pocket, you do try however
name: Pot

desc: How do you even pick up a chain of ants?
name: Pot

desc: You consider taking the branch with you as it's a mighty weapon, but you try breaking it off and it doesn't work
name: Pot

desc: Where are you going to put these guys? In your pockets?
name: Pot

desc: You pick up and repair your lost button
name: Pot

desc: Om nom nom nom
name: Pot

desc: What you going to take the shells with you?
name: Pot

desc: You take the pebble out of your shoe
name: Pot

desc: When are you going to find a cool rock?
name: Pot

desc: A majestic piece of fabric you form into a cape
set_desc: Now it's just a plain old tree sitting here
name: Cape

desc: A key, wonder what it unlocks
set_desc: The bush now looks indistinguishable from any other
name: Key

desc: Maybe this one... Naw
name: Pot

desc: You are no alchemist so you have no idea what usage this has
set_desc: You don't think you'll need any more of them
name: White-Brown Herb

desc: *Squish*
name: Pot

desc: You try to pick a plant intact however you only manage to tear it into pieces... Perhaps you need another tool?
name: Pot

desc: Best not pick these, you might accidentally mix them with your rations
name: Pot

desc: A nifty hat that makes you feel important
name: Captain's hat

desc: You try to pick some, but you only manage to pull red strands... You thought this plant was blue
name: Pot

desc: You reach up to try to grab a bird... You fail
name: Pot

desc: No need to kill anything, especially something struggling to survive
name: Pot

desc: A smaller version of a bear... Wait this is actually an item?
name: bear cub

desc: You grab a hand full but it falls through you hand
name: Pot

desc: A peaceful little flower, you feel this will make a great gift
set_desc: The water of the oasis fills you in this desert land
name: Flower

desc: You extend your hand out to grab it. Ouch! That hurt
name: Pot

desc: Yeah best not do that
name: Pot

desc: You really want to pick that up?
name: Pot

desc: No thanks
name: Pot

desc: A set of shiny mithril armor, this will provide good protection
set_desc: There used to be a set of rare armor here. Wonder who put it here
name: Mithril armor

desc: Golden bars, these must be worth a fortune
name: Gold bars

desc: Yep still can't tell
name: Pot

desc: You pick up your button and add it back to your shirt
name: Pot

desc: While a lot smaller, this teal pebble is very cool and a worthy replacement
set_desc: You wonder if this place has more significant
name: Teal pebble

desc: A crimson clupeidae, wonder what you should do with it
set_desc: Sand quickly replaces what was there
name: Crimson Clupeidae

desc: A mighty tool, used for digging
set_desc: Just broken pieces of wood lay scattered about
name: Shovel

desc: A scale from a slain dragon!
name: dragon scale
